channel.title: Allow a specific group to access a specific dashboard only
channel.description:
Hi there,
Is it possible to allow specific group(s) of users to access specific dashboard(s) only without being able to view other dashboards ?
I assigned the `view_query,execute_query,list_dashboards` permissions to the group of users but they still able to view all dashboards
Thank you

item.title: Allow a specific group to access a specific dashboard only
item.dc:creator: bun4uk
item.description:
Looking for the same functionality

Read full topic
item.source: Allow a specific group to access a specific dashboard only
